title: Yggdra Chronicle Tier List
description: This tier list is based on the current meta in Yggdra Chronicle and ranks characters from S Tier (the best) to C Tier (the worst). It is important to note that this tier list is subjective and may change depending on future updates and content releases.
heading: Yggdra Chronicle Tier List
introText: This tier list is based on the current meta in Yggdra Chronicle and ranks characters from S Tier (the best) to C Tier (the worst). It is important to note that this tier list is subjective and may change depending on future updates and content releases. Additionally, team composition and strategy can greatly impact a unit's effectiveness.

data.itemDescription: The best magic DPS unit in the game. Her high damage output and AoE skills make her a valuable asset in any team

The best support unit in the game. Her ability to provide buffs, debuffs, and shields makes her a versatile addition to any team
